bibl.title: Blurring the Boundaries: Dionysus, Apollo and Bacchylides 17.
bibl.note: Contribution to an international symposium on the god Apollo gathered at Delphi in July 2003. - Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 82 (2010), Bibl. Beilage 3, p. 73.

bibl.title: Apolline Politics and Poetics: International Symposium

bibl.seg: TSAGALIS Christos G., Blurring the Boundaries: Dionysus, Apollo and Bacchylides 17.
Lucia ATHANASSAKI, Richard P. MARTIN and John F. MILLER (Edd.), Apolline Politics and Poetics: International Symposium (Athens, 2009) pp. 199-215.
Contribution to an international symposium on the god Apollo gathered at Delphi in July 2003. - Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 82 (2010), Bibl. Beilage 3, p. 73.
